reviewText: I was a little disappointed as I thought this would follow the TV series, there were 26 episodes and I really wanted them but found out they have not put them on dvd yet.  Although this one had three of the episodes.

I cant say enough good things about this show. Here's the next three episodes of the series and it just gets better. You get to learn more about the characters and the story line gets deeper. As does the complex of the relationships gets deeper. as all good shows do it brings you in closer into the show and makes you feel like you want to be in the show going along with drew, sherry, and everyone else. Be sure to check out my review on dvd 1 of the series for more details bout the show. Buy this and you won't regret it one bit.
i love this its fun and you see what has happen from the frist one

Campy, creepy, hokey.  Did I enjoy it? Yes.  Was it worth my time? No, but if that was how everything was judged, well, I would have skipped quite a few family gatherings.  OK, maybe it was worth the escape.
